name: test_e2e_with_logs[033_SQLI_STACK_004]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_STACK_004` |
| **Name** | Backdoor table creation attempt |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | stacked_queries |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `'; CREATE TABLE backdoor (id INT, cmd VARCHAR(255)); --`
- **Encoded**: `%27%3B%20CREATE%20TABLE%20backdoor%20%28id%20INT%2C%20cmd%20VARCHAR%28255%29%29%3B%20--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~24000ms
- **Timestamp**: 04:53:39.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_STACK_004-1767070419433-f5yu9c pattern_id=SQLI_STACK_004 uri=/?q=%27%3B%20CREATE%20TABLE%20backdoor%20%28id%20INT%2C%20cmd%20VARCHAR%28255%29%29%3B%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
